summary: A step-by-step guide on creating a custom race for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Yes, this is a tutorial on how to make an ACTUAL custom race. I found this while I was digging around my folders (don't ask). This was prepared before Fallout 4 came out, so some of the methods seem a bit old, but even if you follow the guide step-by-step, you'll still get a working race at the end of it all.
[size=3]
CREDITS:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Yscsn (.TRI Animation Information)[/size]
[*][size=3]FancyPants (For Skeleton Fitting and Jigglebone Information)[/size]
[*][size=3]Caliente: For BodySlide [/size]
[*][size=3]Anton0028: For the Animation Tools [/size]
[*][size=3]NifTools Team: For NifSkope and the Blender NIF Scripts [/size]
[*][size=3]Splatypi: For Judy model[/size]
[/list]
My other tutorials:
[list]

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74816/?].EGM, Skeletal Helmet Fitting & Jigglebones Tutorial[/url] (For Skyrim)
[*]Custom Race Tutorial ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/62328/?]Fallout 3 / New Vegas[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/18039/?]Fallout 4[/url])
[/list]
author: lazyradly and FancyPants and yscsn
